title: Stream: BROODS – EP
body:
NZ duo **BROODS** impressed with their two debut tracks, _Bridges_ and _Never Gonna Change_, working with Grammy Winning producer Joel Little (Lorde – Royals).

Having now inked a record deal, Caleb and Georgie Nott have also released their debut self titled EP, six tracks of brilliant, early 00’s inspired synth-pop. Check out the full EP below, including personal highlight, _Sleep Baby Sleep_.

Having now inked a record deal, Caleb and Georgie Nott have also released their debut self titled EP, six tracks of brilliant, early 00’s inspired synth-pop. Check out the full EP \[…\]
